objectives.name: Primary Efficacy Objective
objectives.text: The primary objective of this study is to compare the change from baseline in HbA1c after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin.

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective 1
objectives.text: Compare the percent change from baseline in total daily insulin dose with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective 2
objectives.text: Compare the percent change from baseline in body weight with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective 3
objectives.text: Compare the change from baseline in the mean value of 24-hour glucose readings obtained from continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective 4
objectives.text: Compare the change from baseline in mean amplitude of glucose excursion (MAGE) of 24-hour glucose readings obtained from CGM with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective 5
objectives.text: Compare the change from baseline in the percent of 24-hour glucose readings obtained from CGM that falls within the target range of >70 mg/dL and <=180 mg/dL with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Secondary Efficacy Objective 6
objectives.text: Compare dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin for the proportion of subjects achieving an HbA1c reduction from baseline to Week 24 visit >=0.5% without severe hypoglycemia events

objectives.name: Secondary Safety Objective 1
objectives.text: To assess the proportion of subjects with hypoglycemia events and the frequency and severity of the hypoglycemia events with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin

objectives.name: Secondary Safety Objective 2
objectives.text: To evaluate the safety and tolerability by assessment of adverse events (AE), vital signs, diabetic ketoacidosis (DKA) events, physical examination findings, ECG, and laboratory values

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 1
objectives.text: Assess the proportion of subjects with HbA1c reduction of at least 0.5% (>=0.5%) from baseline with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 2
objectives.text: Assess the proportion of subjects with HbA1c < 7.0% with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 3
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline in fasting plasma glucose (FPG) with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 4
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline in the percent of 24-hour glucose readings obtained from CGM that is within the hypoglycemic range of <=70 mg/dL with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 5
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline in seated systolic blood pressure with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment among subjects with hypertension at baseline

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 6
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline in average glucose values measured by 6-point self monitored blood glucose (SMBG) with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 7
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline in postprandial glucose values measured by 6-point SMBG with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 8
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline in postprandial glucose values measured by CGM with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 9
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline in standard deviation of 24-hour glucose readings obtained from CGM with dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin after 24 weeks of double-blinded treatment

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 10
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline to Week 24 in health status, as measured by the Euro Quality of life 5 dimensions 3 levels (EQ-5D-3L) questionnaire

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 11
objectives.text: Assess the changes from baseline to Week 24 in the summary score for treatment satisfaction and scores for perceived frequency of hyperglycemia and perceived frequency of hypoglycemia, respectively, as measured by the Diabetes Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire status (DTSQs)

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 12
objectives.text: Assess the change from baseline to Week 24 in the fear of hypoglycemia as measured by the Hypoglycemia Fear Survey (HFS-II) Worry Subscale score

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 13
objectives.text: To explore the relationship between observed and/or model estimated pharmacokinetic measures of exposure (eg, AUCss, Cmax, Cmin) and efficacy and/or safety endpoints by using model-based approaches.

objectives.name: Exploratory Objective 14
objectives.text: Compare the number of non-severe hypoglycemic events per subject in those achieving an HbA1c reduction of >=0.5% on dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin versus placebo plus adjustable insulin from baseline to Week 24 visit.

endpoints.name: Primary Efficacy Endpoint
endpoints.text: Change in HbA1c from baseline to Week 24

endpoints.text: Percent change from baseline to Week 24 in total daily insulin dose

endpoints.name: Secondary Efficacy Endpoint 2
endpoints.text: Percent change from baseline to Week 24 in total body weight

endpoints.name: Secondary Safety Endpoint 1
endpoints.text: Proportion of subjects with hypoglycemia events and the frequency and severity of the hypoglycemia events

endpoints.name: Secondary Safety Endpoint 2
endpoints.text: Adverse events (AE), vital signs, diabetic ketoacidosis (DKA) events, physical examination findings, ECG, and laboratory values

endpoints.text: Proportion of subjects with HbA1c reduction of at least 0.5% (>=0.5%) from baseline

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 2
endpoints.text: Proportion of subjects with HbA1c < 7.0%

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 3
endpoints.text: Change from baseline in fasting plasma glucose (FPG)

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 4
endpoints.text: Change from baseline in the percent of 24-hour glucose readings obtained from CGM that is within the hypoglycemic range of <=70 mg/dL

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 5
endpoints.text: Change from baseline in seated systolic blood pressure among subjects with hypertension at baseline

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 6
endpoints.text: Change from baseline in average glucose values measured by 6-point SMBG

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 7
endpoints.text: Change from baseline in postprandial glucose values measured by 6-point SMBG

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 8
endpoints.text: Change from baseline in postprandial glucose values measured by CGM

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 9
endpoints.text: Change from baseline in standard deviation of 24-hour glucose readings obtained from CGM

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 10
endpoints.text: Change from baseline to Week 24 in health status, as measured by the Euro Quality of life 5 dimensions 3 levels (EQ-5D-3L) questionnaire

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 11
endpoints.text: Changes from baseline to Week 24 in the summary score for treatment satisfaction and scores for perceived frequency of hyperglycemia and perceived frequency of hypoglycemia (DTSQs)

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 12
endpoints.text: Change from baseline to Week 24 in the fear of hypoglycemia as measured by the Hypoglycemia Fear Survey (HFS-II) Worry Subscale score

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 13
endpoints.text: Pharmacokinetic measures of exposure (eg, AUCss, Cmax, Cmin)

endpoints.name: Exploratory Endpoint 14
endpoints.text: Number of non-severe hypoglycemic events per subject in those achieving an HbA1c reduction of >=0.5%

estimands.name: Primary Efficacy Estimand (Primary)
estimands.populationSummary: Subjects with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus and inadequate glycemic control (Full Analysis Dataset) Summary measure: Difference in least squares means.

intercurrentEvents.name: Premature discontinuation of randomized treatment
intercurrentEvents.text: Subject discontinues study medication before Week 24

estimands.treatment: Dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin vs Placebo plus adjustable insulin
estimands.analysisPopulation: Subjects with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus and inadequate glycemic control (Full Analysis Dataset)
estimands.variableOfInterest: Change in HbA1c from baseline to Week 24

estimands.populationSummary: Subjects with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus and inadequate glycemic control (Full Analysis Dataset) Summary measure: Difference in least squares means.

estimands.variableOfInterest: Change in HbA1c from baseline to Week 24

estimands.name: Secondary Efficacy Estimand - Insulin Dose
estimands.populationSummary: Full Analysis Dataset Summary measure: Difference in least squares means (log-transformed).
estimands.treatment: Dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin vs Placebo plus adjustable insulin
estimands.variableOfInterest: Percent change from baseline to Week 24 in total daily insulin dose

estimands.name: Secondary Efficacy Estimand - Body Weight
estimands.populationSummary: Full Analysis Dataset Summary measure: Difference in least squares means (log-transformed).
estimands.treatment: Dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin vs Placebo plus adjustable insulin
estimands.variableOfInterest: Percent change from baseline to Week 24 in total body weight

estimands.name: Secondary Efficacy Estimand - Composite Responder
estimands.populationSummary: Full Analysis Dataset Summary measure: Odds ratio (via logistic regression).
estimands.treatment: Dapagliflozin 5 mg or 10 mg plus adjustable insulin vs Placebo plus adjustable insulin
estimands.variableOfInterest: Proportion of subjects achieving an HbA1c reduction from baseline to Week 24 >=0.5% without severe hypoglycemia
